text: Ko onon yo gomɗimɓe, wata on dagin Sari'aaji Alla ɗin, wanaa lebbi hormaŋte ɗin, wanaa haddiyaaji ɗin neldaaɗi, wanaa ɗin maandinaaɗi, wanaa ɓen hooliiɓe [faandii] Suudu Hormaŋte ndun, hiɓe ɗaɓɓa ɓural immorde ka Joomi maɓɓe e welayee. Si on dagintinnike [ka hajju maa ka 'umra], waañee. Wata ngayngu yimɓe duñu on fii ɓe sakkike on gaay e Suudu Hormaŋte ndun, nde jaggiton. Wallindiree e dow diggere e gomɗal. Wata on wallindiri e hoore bakkaatu e jaggitugol. Hulee Alla. Pellet, Alla ko Saɗtuɗo lepte
